item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am Ankit Sharma and I work as an Machine Learning Engineer @Gram Vaani. Previously, I worked as a Senior Research Associate @Mirrorsize. My interests range from reading fiction, study science, machine learning and building on Apple platforms. Public Profiles twitter stackoverflow linkedin hackernews reddit medium telegram instagram facebook

item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: This will be interesting to some people, who wants to read some great books and don’t know where to start from. I will try to have these in _physical form and I’ll keep updating this list as I read more and more books. If you got recommendations, feel free to drop a note! The books I have read and recommended readings Currently reading Bad Blood, John Carreyrou Biographies Steve Jobs, Walter Isaacson Products & Strategy Creative Selection, Ken Kocienda Technical books Fluent Python Deep Learning with Python Hands on Machine Learning This concept of Bookshelf is inspired from Manas Saloi and Patrick Collison.

item.title: Now
item.description: What I am doing now? Work I am working as a Software Engineer in a startup, OnionDev Tech (Gram vaani). My work involves around writing Django Apps to training and deploying Machine Learning models. Current project: To make an QnA System from unstructured data where a farmer can ask anything about his/her crops over an IVR system. Learning I am completing the fast.ai course on Practical Deep Learning for Coders.
